name: Milovan Destil Marković
caption: Belgrade
summary: Milovan DeStil Marković (Serbian Cyrillic: Милован ДеСтил Марковић) (born 9 November 1957 in Čačak, Yugoslavia, today Serbia) is Serbian visual artist, who began his career in the early 1980s. Active for over two decades, he is recently described as father of Transfigurative Painting and the Text Portrait. Visiting Professor Art in Context at the University of Arts, Berlin.
